text: Southaven is a city in northwestern Mississippi. It is a suburb of Memphis, Tennessee. It is in DeSoto County. The city is near the Arkansas and Tennessee state borders. There were around 54,648 people living in Southaven, as of the 2020 census. The city was incorporated on April 15, 1980. == References == Category:Cities in Mississippi Category:1980 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Mississippi
title: Southaven, Mississippi
